website_summaries.verdict: A cute little dinosaur plush toy with voice chat capabilities.
pros: The stuffed dino pal lets parents talk without having to purchase a phone for their littles ones
Works over Wi-Fi and can remember a maximum of 5 networks, so connecting is easy

customer_reviews.title: I was afraid that it would be too young for the 8 year old but she loved it. I would totally recommend this as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I got three of these for christmas presents for my nieces and nephew. They were a HUGE hit. The oldest is 8 and the youngest is 4. I was afraid that it would be too young for the 8 year old but she loved it. I would totally recommend this as a great gift for any kid.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hardee

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Idea that works!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to get it all setup, but it was well worth it. Gave it to my 2 1/2 year old niece as a Christmas gift. I live in CA. She's in TX. It's fun to know (via the internal accelerometer) when she's playing with the toy. I can send her a quick voice text. With her mom's help, she can use it to send voice messages to me or her distant grandparents, or other pre-approved family members (up to 10).
customer_reviews.author: R. Bray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to keep in touch with my grandson. They worked great, then one stopped working. :( I contacted the company, problem resolved right away. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Susan N.

customer_reviews.title: Not Intuitive for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great concept. The issue is the lag in feedback with the buttons are pressed. Children are usually hyperactive when interacting with a toy. Talkie has a sloth-like speed when it toggles through its functions through its voice. The send message button needs to be a lot faster in real-time instead of saying “this button is to send message”; it also needs to stop repeating the user’s message each time, which becomes too repetitive and drags the interaction experience. The buttons are not easy to press in the plush toy for my four year old he ends up not enjoying the experience as the actuation haptics is flawed.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Chu

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!! My 6 year old loves Hank
customer_reviews.text: Terrific!! My 6 year old loves Hank!! No Wifi issues. Works perfectly! Would recommend for kids not quite ready for an iPod or cell phone but still wanting to have the connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi W.

customer_reviews.title: We can't not get the talkie to sink with the ...
customer_reviews.text: We can't not get the talkie to sink with the phone. We have tried at less 10 time. We have taken the batteries out and put them back in 3 times and try the hold process over again.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Reardon

customer_reviews.title: More than 5 stars needed for this toy and company
customer_reviews.text: I and my daughter love this toy, it brings us together when we can't be around each other. The app and toy are easy to use and the support is fast and very helpful if needed. Very simple set up and your off and running. One of the best products I ever purchased and if I could give more stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We got the talkie to help keep in touch during a deployment. Got it and followed all instructions and would not sync to our phones. The customer service line is never answered. They do not return messages or emails. So basically, it's a scam. Notice the only good reviews are from 2017. That's because the product does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant and Laura Farr

customer_reviews.title: A good concept.
customer_reviews.text: A good concept...Were older and not so computer savvy so was difficult to set up but after an hour or so managed and what an amazing toy we know our grandson is going to have hours of fun..... only problem now is we probably won't get no work done because he'll be talking to us non-stop all day long 😁love it!!
customer_reviews.author: robin parks

customer_reviews.title: just doesn't work! difficult in every way
customer_reviews.text: have had to set it up now nearly 7X, messages from family do not come thru- not worth it at all and now its not even working. i've replaced the batteries it just isn't working out at all. wish I never bought it, expensive too :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy! Love the functionality and options
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! Love the functionality and options. Only downside is the time it takes the message to go from the app to the stuffed animal
customer_reviews.author: John V.

customer_reviews.title: Scam - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great idea except that the app is not available and the company doesn’t have a website. Probably a scam. I’ve contacted amazon to report the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Shiessica

customer_reviews.title: Love the product!
customer_reviews.text: What a cute idea! I bought this for my 5 year old granddaughter and she can easily leave messages for those on her approved list. I haven’t figured out yet how I can know when there is a message from her. Hopefully there is something in settings that I haven’t found yet for that notification. You do need the Toymail to be on WiFi. Would recommend this as neat way to stay in touch with grandkids who don’t live close!
customer_reviews.author: shines

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Fun, and a Genuinely Incredible Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Genuinely great product! Everything is so simple to set up. Grandma can use it, my 4 year old can use it. This has quickly becomes my son's favorite toy. Being able to send and receive voice messages from his family members is incredible! Set up is a piece of cake, the plush itself is very soft and well made. The app is very easy to use, and it took my son about 5 seconds to figure out how to send messages. If you're looking for a way to make connecting with friends and family easier for your little one without relying on complicated (for a 3 year old) phones and tablets - this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jody V

customer_reviews.title: It's a great concept just need some fine tuning , if your child will be stayed at home go for it.
customer_reviews.text: It had been used you could tell it was dirty it might just beenit could have been an easy clean only if I buy something used that is my choice although I would like to pay a used price also your phone and the Taki have to be on the same Wi-Fi network you cannot provide this Wi-Fi through your phone so basically wherever the child is needs to be a router that's connected at all times. The child can't take it with them and get messages it can only stay at home and get messages.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy Gobbler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother. It will break or randomly stop working all together and there’s pretty no option for replacement. Customer service with have you going around is circles resetting it in ten different ways; that don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: M is for Miche

customer_reviews.title: Our children love it. I was worried that it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Our children love it. I was worried that it would be very hard to set up after reading reviews but honestly it didn't take long. I wish there were cuter designs available but that is just a personal preference. It is a wonderful way to keep in touch with Daddy when he is deployed or away for training. I think these would sell great by being marketed to the military. I have not tried it on a different wifi than it was set up on but in our house it works well.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 in 3 Talkies Actually Worked!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three Talkies. My granddaughter's has worked perfectly. My grandson's first one had to be returned as defective. It worked on occasion, but needed constantly to be rebooted (removing batteries and reinserting them). My grandson's 2nd one never synced with the phone app, so it was returned also. My daughter has had NO SUPPORT from Toymail...not by phone or by e-mail. My grandson desperately wants one that will work like his sister's. TOYMAIL needs to get their CUSTOMER SERVICE act together!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: Toymail service no longer is in operation !
customer_reviews.text: Why is this toy still being offered for sale? We loved it and used it with our grandchildren for a few years, but recently the connections simply don't work, land my son-in-law read an article that they were being closed. Will someone from the company answer?
customer_reviews.author: 'lin'

customer_reviews.title: Great way to stay in touch with friends and family near and far!
customer_reviews.text: We love Hank the Dino! The set up was super easy. I have two daughters, 6 and 4, and they adore Hank. We also picked up one for my nephew (their cousin) that lives a couple hours away. He's nearly 3 and using his Hank with ease. This has been a wonderful way for the cousins to keep in touch. My youngest especially loves to snuggle Hank and takes him everywhere we go. Besides recording and listening to messages, the girls love to play with Hank and hear him giggle and snore. This toy makes a great gift and is so unique. Hank provides a great way to connect with friends and family near and far.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwogirls

customer_reviews.title: Dino Talkie by Toymail
customer_reviews.text: I am a deployed Soldier and I got this for my 4 year old son. It is a great way to leave him little messages and easy for him to leave messages for his Daddy. Setup was fairly easy and my wife and I are able to leave messages for each other and my son via the apps on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Allen6868

customer_reviews.title: Traveling daddy and son gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband started traveling 4-6 nights a week and my 4 yr old needed a special way to connect. I gave this to them for Christmas. We only used it at home so far , setting up additional WiFi is kind of hard to set up. Also you have to hold down one spot the entire time you send a message and my 4 yr old needs help- but overall great!
customer_reviews.author: Lizz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as easily as described . She used it the day she got it but after that not at all , really to difficult for 4 year old. Maybe an older child ?? But an older child can use moms cell . Cute idea but needs revamping to really be functional for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: I was never able to get this thing working. Very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: mike lomeli

customer_reviews.title: Great way to connect
customer_reviews.text: We are currently stationed over seas, we bought this for my dad so he could keep in touch with his grandkids. Set up was super simple and straight to the point. After we synced his phone to the talkie he recorded a couple and then sent them as a test. The recording were clear and not staticky like Walkie talkies. I would high recommend this to all military, traveling or just long distance families!
customer_reviews.author: Kristee Dyer

customer_reviews.title: They have disabled all tech features
customer_reviews.text: Sent this as a present to a friend who has a kid in the hospital undergoing cancer treatment, he was excited about it, but apparently all the features (app and website) have been disabled. So really what is being sold here is an expensive, ugly stuffed animal with no tech features whatsoever... my fault for insufficient research, don’t make my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jacoby

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with ANY device
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed that it would not work with any of my four devices, including my Amazon devices. Ironic, since they sell the product.
customer_reviews.author: mudsquito

customer_reviews.title: Great screen free way for kids to stay connected!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son (8) for Christmas. He has a couple friends they have one too. He loves sending his friends and my family messages and they love getting them!! Such a great way for kids to stay connected without a screen!! It's a little complicated to set up but follow the directions and you won't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Megan G.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, innovative way to keep in touch and reengage kids in social play.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Maestas

customer_reviews.title: I didn't want to get them each their own until we knew if we liked it and would use it
customer_reviews.text: I bought Hank for my kids for Christmas to share. I didn't want to get them each their own until we knew if we liked it and would use it. We love it so we will be purchasing more! Hank has the cutest voice.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: perfect for little ones
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for work so I got this for my 5yo son. We love sending each other messages whenever I am away.
customer_reviews.author: Z1Z2

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the "cellphone" like messaging whenever they want to!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, I am absolutely in love with the results of this toy. My nephews who live on the other side of the country have within 24 hours sent me 9 voicemails between the two of them. For a 8 and 5 & 1/2 year old, I will absolutely recommend this to everyone I know as a great way to keep that special bond alive and share silliness whenever you like. I was worried it would be tricky to set up, but it was seamless between our iOS phones and the boys talkie. My only regret is not getting them one each!
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon D.

customer_reviews.title: I love that he can message me whenever he wants
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old has been having a blast sending me messages back and forth. I love that he can message me whenever he wants, but I also love that I get a message when hes playing with it. Fun toy, and glad I got it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Melonie

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and fun
customer_reviews.text: My 2 great grandchildren just love them. They are easy to use and easy to carry around with them, They feel great being able to text with mom and grandmother.
customer_reviews.author: F. Brady

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: did not come with in instructions so i can not use it
customer_reviews.author: Stoney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Child's Going Away Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect going away gift! My 7 year old is able to talk to her friend that moved overseas without the use of a computer! She can send me messages at work. I love how small her voice sounds. She can message her grandparents. All of this, without a phone!
customer_reviews.author: MomWithBooks

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful idea for me and my 3 year old son! I work 60 hours a week and only see him when I'm off so "Hank" makes it easy for us to keep up! I recommend any busy parent to purchase one today!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, we were never able to get this thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, we were never able to get this thing to work. It's not simple to set up. Waited too long to return it so it just became the most expensive stuffed animal in our home....
customer_reviews.author: Erin Happ

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my son a few weeks ago and he absolutely loves it! It's a creative way to connect with my children when I'm away from home traveling. This is a great product and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Ellis Jr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great idea. kinda works. couldn't get my son into it.
customer_reviews.author: drnina

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: bought 3 of them to surprise my granddaughters !! have yet to get them to work! Im very disappointed. I ordered them as soon as I saw them on Shark Tank.......still sitting here in the box!
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Fun for mom and dad too.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 6 and this is by far her favorite gift from Santa this year. Surprisingly it has been extra fun for her mother and I as well. We have been sending songs, jokes and random silliness through her Piper (she named it after herself). Great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hill

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son and his best friend,who recently moved to another state, got these for Christmas. He loves getting messages from his friends and family. I love that I get a message every time he plays with it. This reminds me to send him a quick message and ensures he is always getting Toymail. I had no trouble setting it up and my son is able to send and receive massages independently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt recommend it for children under 5 without adult help. We love the toy and all it's features but my 3 year old needs an adults help frequently. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, and the kids love it. Started getting messages immediately.
customer_reviews.author: C + N

customer_reviews.title: 2 Kids = 2 Toymail = Awesomesauce!
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids have a Toymail. Once we figured to change our wifi band it was smooth sailing. They send messages to my husband while he's at work, to grandparents 1,000 miles away & even send me goodnight messages when they are in bed & I'm downstairs. They are really easy to use. My kids are 6 & 8, but I think even younger kids could operate them. They've enjoyed them so much since getting them for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Too bad
customer_reviews.text: I think this would have been great for my brother who has cerebral palsy but my mother said she could not get it to work with her iPhone 5.
customer_reviews.author: Neely S.

customer_reviews.title: We bought three thinking it would be really fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Deosn't work. Never was able to get it connected. Customer service would just send the same suggestions over and over and none worked. We bought three thinking it would be really fun for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Concept is good but my kids keep taking out the sound box
customer_reviews.author: robin goetz

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT what it says it is....Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: This just does not work correctly as advertised, at least the one that I got does not. Maybe its defective I dont know such a dissapointment for $61!
customer_reviews.author: PJ in Az

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea, I just don't use it as much as I would like. Also, my 3 year old son does not really understand how to work it very well. I think it will be better once he gets a bit older.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Waist of money
customer_reviews.text: It worked like for one day and then stopped! I don’t recommend it at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: MGTJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool.
customer_reviews.text: Really works. Clear message. Have sent messages from work to home and back. Pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for kids to give and receive messenges with long distance family
customer_reviews.author: katie hefner

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Listen to the bad reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. I have called customer service and after 2 hours finally got it to sync with my phone. Only for it to then say it couldn't send messages. I have waited to give this to my son while we were away and now have to figure what else we can do... before tomorrow. I should have listened to the terrible reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M

customer_reviews.title: Could not use
customer_reviews.text: Could not find the app to set up the toy. Emailed Custer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great toy especially if you have family out of state
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy, purchased for my nieces in Minnesota so they could get messages from their cousins. Step by step instructions are easy to follow allowing for easy set up! Highly recommend this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Jody B.

customer_reviews.title: I love it, my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I love it, my son loves it. I love that I can connect with him and he loves that it giggles when he throws it!
customer_reviews.author: Sangprajun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandma and 3 year old grandson send voice messages. Not sure which one likes it the most!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love hank the dinosaur and so does my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Love hank the dinosaur and so does my daughter! Getting random messages from her throughout the day is amazing. Def recommend for families that travel for work a lot.
customer_reviews.author: samira

customer_reviews.title: I love this toy
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy! Both my husband and I downloaded the app and got it all set up with no problem at all. We have had so much fun playing with it! I can't wait for our daughter to open it on Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Xmas morning at my house and no battery pouch in the item. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I still cannot get it to work after hours of trying
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Powell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of them and have been very dissatisfied with them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jeeping Kids Connected
customer_reviews.text: Such a great idea for connecting with our niece across the country! She loves both receiving and sending messages, and doesn't go anywhere without it. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: waste of money. I'd return it if time hadn't elapsed. Confusing set up and doesn't work. My daughter tried to set it up and it wouldn't work. I got it to work on my phone but the toy mail only works at my house. Can't add friends or anyone to it. My granddaughter ended up with a phone and it's easy to use and works.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pergament

customer_reviews.title: My Son LOVES his Toymail Hank a Dino!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES his Hank Dino so much! As a mom, I love to be able to directly connect to him when he isn't with me! So fun! My son lives with both his daddy and his mommy but separately and this has become the perfect way for him to stay connected to each parent when he is not with one or the other. He enjoys sending messages as much as possible and receiving them just as much. This fun way to communicate gives me peace of mind and just simply warms my heart! Very excited about this product, and have been recommending it to all my coworkers and family! Hank sorta feels like a member of the family! :)
customer_reviews.author: _in_that_case_

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren and I all love it! I love to hear their voices when ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren and I all love it! I love to hear their voices when they are so very far away from me!
customer_reviews.author: Janice G. Colglazier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: incredible product for keeping family and friends in touch with my kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic interactive toy!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing concept! MY kids can keep in touch with their grandparents in other states...with a toy! They absolutely love the Talkie!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt pair to a device.
customer_reviews.text: Too bad it doesn't connect. Too expensive not to work. We had to return it. They should make it connectable with Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: We love Hank!
customer_reviews.text: I won't lie, I was a little skeptical about this at first. But we have a lot of extended family and my husband is a police officer so he works some crazy hours. I wanted some way for my son to keep in touch with everyone without having to rely on using my phone. My 4 year old LOVES Hank! He's always checking for new messages and loves that he can send his own messages and say what he wants. The set up was super easy and everyone who we use it with has said it was easy as well. If you're considering purchasing this it is 100% worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are having so much fun staying connected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand daughter. We are having so much fun staying connected. Love Love Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! So fun to get messages from my kids while I’m at work!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey M Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Growing up with Toymail!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old has been growing up with the Toymail family! From the early mailmen to the plush - my daughter enjoys using toymail to communicate with her relatives out of town and to send messages to me when I'm traveling for work. Some of her friends have gotten Talkies as well (it's a go to birthday gift now!) and she can chat with her friends in a safe, fun way. We love the plush talkies because they can snuggle up close to the kiddos (or grandmas!).
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive to have so many flaws
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was excited about this when we saw it on Shark Tank, but unfortunately it didn't live up to expectations. It never checked for messages on its own, or at least it didn't chime when it received one. To change any of the settings (i.e. sleep and wake times), we had to open it up and take a battery out then press the play button for 15 seconds to get it to sync. Then, after 3 days of minimal use it stopped working altogether. Returning for a refund. At this price point, I would expect the toy to work without being so buggy.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. 3 yr old nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. 3 yr old nephew loves it. Little difficult to set up. Could use more memory to process multiple messages. Tends to bogg down.
customer_reviews.author: matt hefferin

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on 6/12. Gave it to my niece for her 3rd birthday on 7/9...my sister texted me to say it has stopped working today after one month :( They changed the battery thinking that may be it, however, all the buttons say "downloading messages" bummer when my niece is just starting to understand how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincci

customer_reviews.title: ... and nephew so we could stay in touch more easily (as well as their grandparents who live across the ...
customer_reviews.text: I live abroad and purchased these for my niece and nephew so we could stay in touch more easily (as well as their grandparents who live across the continent. So far, they seem to be a bit. A bit challenging for the kids to sort out how to use them at first, but they're on the younger end of the age spectrum for these toys. The voice messages are super cute, so that's a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love our new talkie
customer_reviews.text: We love our new talkie! It is so nice to be able to send and receive messages with my kids when I am at work all day - without giving them phones! We are going to get another one so both of my kids have their own.
customer_reviews.author: Brad and Christine Koppang

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very sad because this could be a great product. We bought TWO of these and neither one would connect to our WIFI - and our WIFI was perfectly fine. Judging from some other reviews, a lot of people had the same issue. I'm starting to think some of these reviews aren't real. We tried the setup on 3 different phones and they wouldn't connect on any of them. What are the odds of two different toymails being faulty? We sent them back to Amazon and were refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Slaten Mclelland

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had help setting up
customer_reviews.text: Emailed the company for help Toy is difficult to setup
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited to be the aunt giving the best gift ...
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to be the aunt giving the best gift this year. Unfortunately, we were never able to get it working. We emailed back and forth with customer service and none of the things suggested ever worked. If you enjoy things like reconfiguring your Wifi settings, finding the correct combination of settings on you smart phone, and being disappointed over and over again then this is the product to purchase. This could be a really cool toy and fun way to connect with your kids, but the creators should find a way to have a problem free set up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE SCAM TOY
customer_reviews.text: This toy is TERRIBLE! There's nothing good about it. Not easy to use for my kids. The app is ridiculous, it's difficult for the family members to use and it doesn't even work appropriately. The toy doesn't get all the messages and the toy doesn't notify the child at all. It plays the sams old messages for days without updating. I think the people leaving good reviews must be friends with the people who created this toy or got paid for it. I'm very good with technology but I couldn't be more disappointed with this "toy" my kids were very frustrated on Christmas day trying to make this thing work. DON'T WAIST YOUR MONEY ON THIS!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and pricey
customer_reviews.text: We have never gotten this to work. Horrible and pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
